testsuite.name: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: When I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: And I navigate to the System Settings page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: Then The Max Users setting is default
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: When I set the Max Users value to 0
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: Then The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: And The Max Users setting is 0
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: When I set the Max Users value to 200
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: Then The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: And The Max Users setting is 200
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: When I clear the Max Users field
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: Then The following System Settings error is visible: Max Users is required.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: When I set the Max Users value to user
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: Then The following System Settings error is visible: Max Users must be an integer.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: When I set the Max Users value to -5
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: Then The following System Settings error is visible: Must be integer >= 0
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: When I set the Max Users value to 5.5
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: Then The following System Settings error is visible: Max Users must be an integer.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Settings page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.

testcase.name: Then The Max Users setting is 200
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Max Users setting is persisted and validated.
